outputs.output_descr:
Output 1: National Electoral Institutions and processes strengthened in accordance with international standards within which Institutional and operational support to CEC, electoral materials and logistics, capacity development is provided
Output 2: Increased and inclusive participation in electoral processes. Within this output, it is planned to provide support in institutional communication, electoral information and education, support to civil society as well as gender and youth issues. 
Output 3: Enabling a peaceful and secure environment for elections. It is planned to provide support in enabling secure environment for elections and management of electoral disputes.

project_descr: Support the Kyrgyz authorities with technical assistance aimed at conducting democratic and transparent elections, following an explicit request from the Provisional Government.
